ingredients: 1 (14-ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14-ounce) can diced tomatoes, with juices (fire-roasted works well)
optional toppings: tortilla strips, sliced avocado, grated cheese, sour cream, chopped fresh cilantro, and/or pico de gallo.
